name: TwitchDownloader
tagline: A download tool for past broadcasts on Twitch
body:
### Welcome to the project Page of TwitchDownloader

TwitchDownloader is a small Java App that allows you to download Videos from Twitch. You can download and review the source code on Github. A compiled version is hosted on my Website

[Download TwitchVodLoader.jar](http://http://trabauer.com/downloads/TwitchVodLoader.jar)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
